/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with modern buildings, their glass and steel facades reflecting the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
